item.title: Inequality doesnt help the economy - vox
item.description: #internetContent #economy Article link: No, inequality doesn’t help the economy grow - Vox The myth of equality-efficiency tradeoff: The author argues that there is no sound basis for believing that a more equal distribution of income would harm the efficiency of the economy.

item.title: What is a recession - investopia
item.description: #internetContent #economy Article link: Recession: Definition, Causes, Examples and FAQs A recession is a significant, widespread, and prolonged downturn in economic activity.
